content.description:
You will listen to a selection in Chinese. After listening to the selection, choose the response that is best according to the selection.
School conversation
content.question: When does the man prefer to practice?

choices.label: When there are few people around
When his mother is not at home

content.answer: When there are few people around

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meaning of a text.
